fields.title: The Godfather
fields.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

fields.title: The Dark Knight
fields.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

fields.title: Inception
fields.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

fields.title: Pulp Fiction
fields.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

fields.title: The Matrix
fields.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

fields.title: Fight Club
fields.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

fields.title: Forrest Gump
fields.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
fields.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

fields.title: Schindler's List
fields.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

fields.title: The Silence of the Lambs
fields.description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

fields.title: Interstellar
fields.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

fields.title: Gladiator
fields.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

fields.title: The Lion King
fields.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
